title: Game-Based Mathematical Creative Problem-Solving Course

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: A program for pre-service undergraduate teachers aiming to foster mathematical creativity in a game-based VR environment.

learning_goals: Solve non-standard mathematical problems using three or more creative strategies through game-based simulations.
Collaborate with team members in a VR environment and document mathematical reasoning processes with over 80% participation.
Complete mathematical problem-creation artifacts incorporating game elements through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
